util

类 FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    文件操作工具类

      Read or write file
    • #readFile(String) read file
    • #readFileToList(String) read file to string list
    • writeFile(String, String, boolean) write file from String
    • writeFile(String, String) write file from String
    • writeFile(String, List, boolean) write file from String List
    • writeFile(String, List) write file from String List
    • writeFile(String, InputStream) write file
    • writeFile(String, InputStream, boolean) write file
    • writeFile(File, InputStream) write file
    • writeFile(File, InputStream, boolean) write file
      Operate file
    • copyFile(String, String)
    • getFileExtension(String)
    • getFileName(String)
    • getFileNameWithoutExtension(String)
    • getFileSize(String)
    • deleteFile(String)
    • isFileExist(String)
    • isFolderExist(String)
    • makeFolders(String)
    • makeDirs(String)
    作者:
    jingle1267@163.com

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean copyFile(java.lang.String sourceFilePath, java.lang.String destFilePath)
      copy file
      static boolean deleteFile(java.io.File file)
      删除文件或者空的文件夹
      static boolean DeleteFile(java.io.File file)
      递归删除文件和文件夹
      static boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String path)
      delete file or directory if path is null or empty, return true if path not exist, return true if path exist, delete recursion. return true
      static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
      get suffix of file from path

      getFileExtension(null) = "" getFileExtension("") = "" getFileExtension(" ") = " " getFileExtension("a.mp3") = "mp3" getFileExtension("a.b.rmvb") = "rmvb" getFileExtension("abc") = "" getFileExtension("c:\\") = "" getFileExtension("c:\\a") = "" getFileExtension("c:\\a.b") = "b" getFileExtension("c:a.txt\\a") = "" getFileExtension("/home/admin") = "" getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b") = "" getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3") = "mp3"

      static java.io.FileFilter getFileFilter(java.lang.String reg, boolean isdir)
      示例:"^.\*\.
      static java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String filePath)
      get file name from path, include suffix

      getFileName(null) = null getFileName("") = "" getFileName(" ") = " " getFileName("a.mp3") = "a.mp3" getFileName("a.b.rmvb") = "a.b.rmvb" getFileName("abc") = "abc" getFileName("c:\\") = "" getFileName("c:\\a") = "a" getFileName("c:\\a.b") = "a.b" getFileName("c:a.txt\\a") = "a" getFileName("/home/admin") = "admin" getFileName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3") = "b.mp3"

      static java.lang.String getFileNameWithoutExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
      get file name from path, not include suffix

      getFileNameWithoutExtension(null) = null getFileNameWithoutExtension("") = "" getFileNameWithoutExtension(" ") = " " getFileNameWithoutExtension("abc") = "abc" getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.mp3") = "a" getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.b.rmvb") = "a.b" getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\") = "" getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a") = "a" getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a.b") = "a" getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:a.txt\\a") = "a" getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin") = "admin" getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3") = "b"

      static java.lang.String getFileSize(java.io.File file)
      文件大小获取
      static long getFileSize(java.lang.String path)
      get file size if path is null or empty, return -1 if path exist and it is a file, return file size, else return -1
      static java.lang.String getFolderName(java.lang.String filePath)
      get folder name from path

      getFolderName(null) = null getFolderName("") = "" getFolderName(" ") = "" getFolderName("a.mp3") = "" getFolderName("a.b.rmvb") = "" getFolderName("abc") = "" getFolderName("c:\\") = "c:" getFolderName("c:\\a") = "c:" getFolderName("c:\\a.b") = "c:" getFolderName("c:a.txt\\a") = "c:a.txt" getFolderName("c:a\\b\\c\\d.txt") = "c:a\\b\\c" getFolderName("/home/admin") = "/home" getFolderName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3") = "/home/admin/a.txt"

      static java.lang.String getMimeType(java.io.File file, android.app.Activity activity)
      获取以后缀名为ID的值
      static byte[] input2byte(java.io.InputStream inStream)
      输入流转byte[]
      static boolean isFileExist(java.lang.String filePath)
      Indicates if this file represents a file on the underlying file system.
      static boolean isFolderExist(java.lang.String directoryPath)
      Indicates if this file represents a directory on the underlying file system.

      Creates the directory named by the trailing filename of this file, including the complete directory path required to create this directory.

      使用系统程序打开文件

      • getFileFilter

        public static java.io.FileFilter getFileFilter(java.lang.String reg,
                                               boolean isdir)
        示例:"^.\*\.(mp3|mp4|3gp)$"
        参数:
        reg - 目前允许取值 REG_MTV, REG_MP3, REG_JPG三种
        返回:
        文件过滤器

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder readFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                               java.lang.String charsetName)
        read file
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        charsetName - The name of a supported charset
        返回:
        if file not exist, return null, else return content of file
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator BufferedReader

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                java.lang.String content,
                                boolean append)
        write file
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        content - 内容
        append - is append, if true, write to the end of file, else clear content of file and write into it
        返回:
        return false if content is empty, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileWriter

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> contentList,
                                boolean append)
        write file
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        contentList - 内容List
        append - is append, if true, write to the end of file, else clear content of file and write into it
        返回:
        return false if contentList is empty, true otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileWriter

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                java.io.InputStream stream)
        write file, the bytes will be written to the begin of the file
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        stream - InputStream
        返回:
        执行结果
        另请参阅:
        #writeFile(String, InputStream, boolean)}

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                java.io.InputStream stream,
                                boolean append)
        write file
        参数:
        filePath - the file to be opened for writing.
        stream - the input stream
        append - if true, then bytes will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        返回:
        return true
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileOutputStream

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.io.File file,
                                java.io.InputStream stream)
        write file, the bytes will be written to the begin of the file
        参数:
        file - File对象
        stream - InputStream
        返回:
        另请参阅:
        #writeFile(File, InputStream, boolean)}

      • writeFile

        public static boolean writeFile(java.io.File file,
                                java.io.InputStream stream,
                                boolean append)
        write file
        参数:
        file - the file to be opened for writing.
        stream - the input stream
        append - if true, then bytes will be written to the end of the file rather than the beginning
        返回:
        return true
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator FileOutputStream

      • readFileToList

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> readFileToList(java.lang.String filePath,
                                                              java.lang.String charsetName)
        read file to string list, a element of list is a line
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        charsetName - 编码方式 The name of a supported charset
        返回:
        if file not exist, return null, else return content of file
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs while operator BufferedReader

      • getFileNameWithoutExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileNameWithoutExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
        get file name from path, not include suffix 

              getFileNameWithoutExtension(null)               =   null
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("")                 =   ""
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("abc")              =   "abc"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.mp3")            =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("a.b.rmvb")         =   "a.b"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a")             =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:\\a.b")           =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "a"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin")      =   "admin"
      getFileNameWithoutExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "b"
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        file name from path, not include suffix

      • getFileName

        public static java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String filePath)
        get file name from path, include suffix 

              getFileName(null)               =   null
      getFileName("")                 =   ""
      getFileName("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileName("a.mp3")            =   "a.mp3"
      getFileName("a.b.rmvb")         =   "a.b.rmvb"
      getFileName("abc")              =   "abc"
      getFileName("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileName("c:\\a")             =   "a"
      getFileName("c:\\a.b")           =   "a.b"
      getFileName("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "a"
      getFileName("/home/admin")      =   "admin"
      getFileName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "b.mp3"
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        file name from path, include suffix

      • getFolderName

        public static java.lang.String getFolderName(java.lang.String filePath)
        get folder name from path 

              getFolderName(null)               =   null
      getFolderName("")                 =   ""
      getFolderName("   ")              =   ""
      getFolderName("a.mp3")            =   ""
      getFolderName("a.b.rmvb")         =   ""
      getFolderName("abc")              =   ""
      getFolderName("c:\\")              =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:\\a")             =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:\\a.b")           =   "c:"
      getFolderName("c:a.txt\\a")        =   "c:a.txt"
      getFolderName("c:a\\b\\c\\d.txt")    =   "c:a\\b\\c"
      getFolderName("/home/admin")      =   "/home"
      getFolderName("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "/home/admin/a.txt"
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        文件夹名称

      • getFileExtension

        public static java.lang.String getFileExtension(java.lang.String filePath)
        get suffix of file from path 

              getFileExtension(null)               =   ""
      getFileExtension("")                 =   ""
      getFileExtension("   ")              =   "   "
      getFileExtension("a.mp3")            =   "mp3"
      getFileExtension("a.b.rmvb")         =   "rmvb"
      getFileExtension("abc")              =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\")              =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\a")             =   ""
      getFileExtension("c:\\a.b")           =   "b"
      getFileExtension("c:a.txt\\a")        =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin")      =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b")  =   ""
      getFileExtension("/home/admin/a.txt/b.mp3")  =   "mp3"
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:

      • makeDirs

        public static boolean makeDirs(java.lang.String filePath)
        Creates the directory named by the trailing filename of this file, including the complete directory path required to create this directory.

          Attentions:
        • makeDirs("C:\\Users\\Trinea") can only create users folder
        • makeFolder("C:\\Users\\Trinea\\") can create Trinea folder
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        true if the necessary directories have been created or the target directory already exists, false one of the directories can not be created.
        • if getFolderName(String) return null, return false
        • if target directory already exists, return true
        • return java.io.File#makeFolder

      • makeFolders

        public static boolean makeFolders(java.lang.String filePath)
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        执行结果
        另请参阅:
        makeDirs(String)

      • isFileExist

        public static boolean isFileExist(java.lang.String filePath)
        Indicates if this file represents a file on the underlying file system.
        参数:
        filePath - 文件路径
        返回:
        是否存在文件

      • isFolderExist

        public static boolean isFolderExist(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        Indicates if this file represents a directory on the underlying file system.
        参数:
        directoryPath - 文件夹路径
        返回:
        文件夹是否存在

      • deleteFile

        public static boolean deleteFile(java.lang.String path)
        delete file or directory
        • if path is null or empty, return true
        • if path not exist, return true
        • if path exist, delete recursion. return true
          参数:
          path - 文件路径
          返回:
          是否删除成功

        • getFileSize

          public static long getFileSize(java.lang.String path)
          get file size
          • if path is null or empty, return -1
          • if path exist and it is a file, return file size, else return -1
            参数:
            path - 文件路径
            返回:
            returns the length of this file in bytes. returns -1 if the file does not exist.

          • uri2File

            public static java.io.File uri2File(android.app.Activity activity,
                                    android.net.Uri uri)
            把uri转为File对象
            参数:
            activity - Activity
            uri - 文件Uri
            返回:
            File对象
